KECHAJFXCAL DATA:
The Model 706 Transmitter is housed in a handsome aluminum cabinet, finished
in lustrous two-tone green enamel. The four separate panel units contained in the
cabinet are designed so that they may be mounted in any standard 19" relay rack. If
desired.
